content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][rev_slider_vc alias=”home”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”15″ el_class=”mbHide”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ el_class=”spaceReduce”]
[vc_custom_heading text=”Los Angeles General Contractors
and Custom Home Builders” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”]
[vc_column_text]

Joel & Co. Construction is a premier general contracting company located in Los Angeles, California serving the San Fernando Valley as well as the greater Los Angeles region. Specializing in new construction, custom home building, residential renovations, and commercial construction, Joel & Co. always strives toward sustainable, eco-friendly construction, and best practices. The company thrives on making the difficult, delightful and is particularly passionate about kitchen and bathroom remodeling and room additions.

Joel & Co. takes pride in quality craftsmanship, attention to detail, and provides full and open communication with each and every client. With each project, it is understood that this is not about simply putting up walls or tile — it is about manifesting the vision of the client and keeping that vision the central focus throughout the construction process. For these reasons, the company is among the most trusted and fastest-growing renovation specialists and custom home builders in Los Angeles.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”100″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” typography_style=”white” css=”.vc_custom_1599464255511{background: #828282 url(https://losangelesgeneralcontractor.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/03/who-we-are.jpg?id=1987) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” el_class=”mbHide”][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”reduceSpacing”]
[vc_custom_heading text=”Who We Are” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1580715045576{padding-bottom: 25px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1591322952223{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”]

With over 50 years of combined experience, Joel & Co. Construction has steadily grown from a modest home remodeling contractor into a large-scale commerical and residential construction business. Today, the company continues to maintain their client-first approach, and insist on bringing integrity, honesty, and transparency to every job, every time.

The company’s continued success is due in part to their commitment to practicing safe construction methods and strict compliance with all applicable laws, rules and regulations. They work closely with clients, civil and structural engineers, architects and designers with a collaborative mindset and a common goal: to deliver a successful and beautiful project.

[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″ el_class=”mbHide”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ el_class=”reduceHeight”][vc_empty_space height=”125″ el_class=”height”][vc_custom_heading text=”Our Services” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Joel & Co. Construction is often recognized as one of the leading general contracting companies in Los Angeles due to superior craftsmanship and ability to understand and execute high-level aesthetic excellence that clients desire. Whether the project calls for a traditional, contemporary, or modern design, the team will oversee every phase of construction. These teams are comprised of experts who specialize in numerous types of services and construction projects:

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″ el_class=”marginLow”][vc_column][vc_row_inner gap=”35″ el_class=”marginLow”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1582324606686{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2475″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”./general-contractors/” img_hover=”opacity” css=”.vc_custom_1582568157924{padding-right: 100px !important;padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”25″]

General Contracting

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1591755276564{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”]

From remodeling to building a new home from the ground up, Joel & Co. is passionate about creating a rewarding construction experience for our clients, our designers and trade partners, and our team.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1582324617840{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2474″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”./custom-home-builder/” img_hover=”opacity” css=”.vc_custom_1582568178097{padding-right: 100px !important;padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”25″]

Custom Home Building

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1590454049862{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”]

The team at Joel & Co. possess a powerful understanding of the design process, and the creativity to synthesize it with construction planning.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1582324625286{padding-right: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2472″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”./kitchen-remodeling/” img_hover=”opacity” css=”.vc_custom_1590100581850{padding-right: 100px !important;padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”25″]

Kitchen Remodeling

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1590453463463{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”]

Remodeling the kitchen is a great way to give a home a facelift. Working within the client’s budget, Joel & Co. provides the best service and return on investment.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_empty_space height=”25″][vc_row_inner gap=”35″ el_class=”marginLow”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1582324508735{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2494″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”./bathroom-remodeling/” img_hover=”opacity” css=”.vc_custom_1589903720408{padding-right: 100px !important;padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”25″]

Bathroom Remodeling

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1590453918875{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”]

Joel & Co. can transform any bathroom into a desirable retreat ⁠— bringing the vision of the homeowner to life by redesigning and remodeling their old bathrooms and transforming them into a dream space.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1582324514311{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2482″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”./room-additions/” img_hover=”opacity” css=”.vc_custom_1582568197276{padding-right: 100px !important;padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”25″]

Room Additions

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1591755622652{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”]

Adding additional rooms is an important job and is best left to an experienced room addition contractor. Joel & Co. provides renditions of the general and specific areas of the home to present the best plan of action for the new addition.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1582324522039{padding-right: 10px !important;padding-left: 10px !important;}”][vc_single_image image=”2484″ alignment=”center” onclick=”custom_link” link=”https://losangelesgeneralcontractor.com/commercial-construction” img_hover=”opacity” css=”.vc_custom_1590455918458{padding-right: 100px !important;padding-left: 100px !important;}”][vc_empty_space height=”25″]

Commercial Construction

[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1590453941183{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}”]

Whether you need to renovate a restaurant or build a new, high-end spa, Joel & Co.’s quality workmanship makes the planning and construction process simple and easy ⁠— resolving in a practical and attractive commercial space.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row gap=”35″ el_class=”mbHide”][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”2/3″ el_class=”spaceLow”][vc_empty_space height=”50″][vc_custom_heading text=”Building Better Relationships” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”marGin”][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Joel & Co. Construction prides itself on being a different kind of company. The strong commitment to quality construction that the company is renowned for, in turn builds devotion and trust and better relationships with clients. Throughout the construction process, the teams maintain communication and transparency — and if something is wrong, it is guaranteed to be made right.

Whether you’re looking for a general contractor in Los Angeles to finally give you the kitchen you deserve, or an experienced team of custom home builders to bring your dream house to life, the team cannot wait to work with you. To find out more about what Joel & Co. Construction can do for you, or to inquire about any of our services, feel free to make contact today.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”25″][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/6″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1599460063607{padding-top: 35px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;}” el_id=”reducePadding”][vc_column el_class=”blogSpacing”][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Blog” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center” use_theme_fonts=”yes” link=”url:%2Fblog%2F|title:Visit%20our%20blog||”][vc_empty_space height=”25px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Great DIY Bathroom Remodel Ideas

Is your bathroom looking a little down in the dumps? Could it use a glow-up? Follow this guide to the best DIY bathroom remodels to turn your bathroom into an asset on a budget. How to Remodel a Bathroom In 6 Steps 1. Remove Bathroom Fixtures If you're planning a DIY bathroom remodel, one of the first things you'll need to do is remove the old bathroom fixtures. This can be a bit tricky, depending on what type of fixtures…
